altername_name: Simple DS Series Vol. 17: The Nezumi no Action Game: Mouse Town Roddy to Rita no Daibouken
name: Flushed Away
overview: The only video game based on the DreamWorks Animation and Aardman, Flushed Away lets players relive the movie and beyond as they assume the roles of Roddy, Rita and take the wheel of the Jammy Dodger watercraft. Maneuver through a dangerous underground city filled with enemies, waterfalls and traps in a struggle against the villainous Toad and his evil plans.
